quoteText:
Ryver may amend or modify these Terms at any time in its sole and absolute discretion, subject to notice to you.
The modified Terms will be effective immediately upon your receipt of notice to you by email or a message in the Service, and you agree to be bound by the new terms and conditions of the posted Terms by continuing your use of any Service
title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
